<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Repulse the Wicken](/Feats.aspx?ID=3603) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882)

**Trigger**
An undead within your reach critically fails an attack roll targeting you.

</column>

---

You use your foe's failure as an opening to push them away. You attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the undead.
name: Repulse the Wicken
